description: Travel the world and power your devices wherever you go. This adapter connects an ungrounded 2-prong appliance to an outlet and simultaneously charge 2 USB devices. A fuse ensures you don’t immediately fry an electronic device if you use it with the wrong voltage. (Note that this adapter is not a voltage converter. Your device must be compatible with the voltage of the outlet you’re using.)Female plugs for Australia/China, UK, USA/Japan, Europe (2-pole Euro).Male retractable plugs for Australia/China, UK, USA, Europe (2-pole Euro).Works for non-grounded plugs only (not 3-prong).Dual USB top for charging 2 USB devices simultaneously.Input voltage is 100–250V.Maximum load is 2.5A.USB output is 5V/2400mA shared.
name: Skross MUV USB World Adapter
